titleStmt.title: Cyuile and vncyuile life a discourse very profitable, pleasant, and fit to bee read of all nobilitie and gentlemen : where, in forme of a dialoge is disputed, what order of lyfe best beseemeth a gentleman in all ages and times ...

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Jones, and are to bee solde at his shop ouer agaynst Sainct Sepulchers Church,
